subject: Automobile Racing
lead_paragraph: Jeff Gordon took advantage of an accident sparked by his teammate Jimmie Johnson and a touch of timely rain Sunday at Pocono Raceway in Long Pond, Pa., to win his first race of the season.
snippet: Jeff Gordon took advantage of an accident sparked by his teammate Jimmie Johnson and a touch of timely rain Sunday at Pocono Raceway in Long Pond, Pa., to win his first race of the season.
